column1: 1981: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series):
:Although she is only named in passing
column2: Diana Bishop plays Lobelia at Bilbos 111th Birthday party.  She and Otho Sackville-Baggins are given a brief exchange complaining about being part of "one gross"
column3: and questioning what "Frodo coming into his inheritance" means.

column2: Lobelia appears as two different cards: "Mistress Lobelia" is a Resource Ally

column1: 2001: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring:
: Lobelia (portrayed by Elizabeth Moody) appears briefly along with Otho in the film
column2: attempting to confront Bilbo Baggins during his Bilbos Farewell Party
column3: though Bilbo manages to elude their presence.

column1: 2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game):

:Lobelia (voiced by Jennifer Hale) appears in Bywater. Frodo has to give her the Bag End Deed as one of the first missions. When Frodo approaches her she insists he first warn Robin Smallburrow of the wolves in the Shire by ringing the warning bell. Frodo does so
column2: before presenting an exhilirated Lobelia with the Bag End Deed.

column1: : Lobelia is seen briefly in the The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition) (along with Otho) in the marketplace outside of the Green Dragon Inn. The characters costume is deliberately ostentatious to be "bright and show-offy" as "she aspires to the best dressed lady in Hobbiton".Daniel Falconer
column2: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Chronicles: Art & Design

column1: 2014: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies:
:She and Otho are also seen at the end of the film when Bilbos possessions are being auctioned off as he returns to the Shire. Lobelia pretends not to know who Bilbo is
column2: but he calls her on it. She is portrayed by Erin Banks.

column1: Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
